metadata.title: CVE-2018-21030 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
Jupyter Notebook before 5.5.0 does not use a CSP header to treat served files as belonging to a separate origin. Thus, for example, an XSS payload can be placed in an SVG document.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-21030` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

jupyter-notebook - 5.7.8-1
python3-notebook - 5.7.8-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: jupyter-notebook package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.7.8-1').
